thread.title: THERESE
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by THERESE

author: THERESE
title: THERESE
text:
Recently I rented a car through Redspot for the first time. I found their customer service officers to be courteous & friendly. The prices were very competitive & the car neat & clean.
All went very smoothly & I would not hesitate to recommend them or rent another car from them.
